headline: Retirees Are Quietly Moving Into This Vanguard Fund After Its 12% Dividend Increase
summary: Exchange traded funds (ETFs) can be a cornerstone of retirement investing, especially for retirees seeking reliable income sources. Instead of chasing fast wealth, priorities will include solid yield, growth potential, and safety through diversification. Among the best-known fund managers currently offering high-yield ETFs suitable for retirees is Vanguard. Indeed, there’s a wide selection of Vanguard ... headline: Broadcom Wi-Fi 8 Launch Sparks Questions On AI Growth And Valuation
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) has introduced what it calls the industry's first Wi-Fi 8 access point and switch platform for AI-ready enterprise networks. The new platform brings integrated AI acceleration and analytics capabilities directly to the network edge. Broadcom's solution is designed with end-to-end MACsec security and support for real-time AI applications in enterprise settings. For investors looking at NasdaqGS:AVGO, this move sits within Broadcom's core chip and networking...

headline: Arista Results Highlight AI Networking Growth And VeloCloud SD WAN Expansion
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) reported strong fourth quarter and full year results, supported by rapid expansion in AI networking and key product launches. The company highlighted material growth in AI networking and campus markets, alongside positive forward guidance that factors in supply chain considerations. Arista acquired VeloCloud SD-WAN from Broadcom, signaling an entry into software defined wide area networking and an extension of its cloud networking portfolio. Arista is best known...

headline: Efinix Announces Boon Chye (BC) Ooi Joining Board of Directors
summary: CUPERTINO, Calif., February 17, 2026--Efinix®, Inc., the FPGA pioneer accelerating edge AI innovation, today announced that Boon Chye (BC) Ooi has joined its Board of Directors. Ooi, a semiconductor industry veteran with more than 45 years of operational leadership experience, will provide strategic guidance as Efinix scales its business and expands its market presence in FPGA and edge AI applications.

raw.headline: Efinix Announces Boon Chye (BC) Ooi Joining Board of Directors
raw.summary: CUPERTINO, Calif., February 17, 2026--Efinix®, Inc., the FPGA pioneer accelerating edge AI innovation, today announced that Boon Chye (BC) Ooi has joined its Board of Directors. Ooi, a semiconductor industry veteran with more than 45 years of operational leadership experience, will provide strategic guidance as Efinix scales its business and expands its market presence in FPGA and edge AI applications.

headline: Nvidia, Broadcom In Focus - Analyst Hikes AI Market Forecast To Trillion-Dollar Peak
summary: Nvidia (NVDA) and Broadcom (AVGO) shares are surging after BofA analyst Vivek Arya raised his 2030 AI data-center market forecast to a staggering $1.4 trillion. Citing "off-the-charts" demand and secured supply chains, BofA predicts that AI systems will grow by 100% this year, positioning these chip leaders for a historic revenue windfall.

headline: Nvidia Stock Falls. There Are Reasons to Believe It Will Rally.
summary: Nvidia  stock was edging down early Tuesday.  Wall Street is looking to the company’s earnings report, due Feb. 25, as a catalyst to get the stock moving upward again.  “We expect better results and guidance as GB300 [Blackwell AI hardware] continues to ramp through 1H26…AI demand is supported by ever-increasing hyperscale capex plans,” wrote Susquehanna analyst Christopher Rolland in a research note on Tuesday.
